history.narrative: Law 5-52 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-222, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 4, 1983 and October 18, 1983, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 9, 1983, it was assigned Act No. 5-78 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
